Initial commit: Orchestrator Agent foundation

Core Infrastructure:
- Orchestrator requirements rubric with 15 capability areas
- NATS message bus for inter-agent communication
- MCP server with 7 tools and 4 resources

- Complete project structure (src/, tests/, config/, docs/)

NATS Integration:
- NATSMessageBus class with 4 communication patterns
- 11 message types for agent coordination
- Subject hierarchy: orchestrator.{broadcast|agent|team|queue}
- Working examples demonstrating all patterns
- Architecture docs and setup guides

MCP Integration:
- Orchestrator MCP server with task analysis tools
- Resources for roadmap, requirements, priorities
- Auto-configured in .claude/mcp-config.json

Documentation:
- NATS architecture and setup guides
- Subagent development strategy with LLM-optimized prompts
- Autonomous agent development flow (no human timescales)
- Complete AI assistant guide (CLAUDE.md)
- User-facing README with quick start

Dependencies:
- nats-py>=2.7.0 for NATS client
- fastmcp>=2.0.0 and mcp>=1.0.0 for MCP
- pytest, black, ruff, mypy for testing/quality
